about_the_game:
From dusk till dawn you navigate the hand drawn city of Solis. Your pursuit is focused on the elusive CEO of eLiXeR, the company you work for. eliXeR promises something incredible: eternal life. As Billie; a PR-agent, you've effectively sold this vision to the public, yet the truth behind your employer remains shrouded in mystery.

Throughout your journey, you'll encounter a myriad of individuals with diverse perspectives, ultimately leading you to forge your own beliefs.

[img][/img]


This is the demo version of Solis and contains the early part of the story,

name: Solis Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I-5
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5700
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A hand-drawn adventure about technology and deception in the city of Solis at nighttime. (Demo version)
